title: Enjoy Instant Discount of Rs. 500 on Minimum Transaction of Rs. 5000
offer: Instant Discount of Rs. 500
terms_and_conditions:
This offer is applicable for booking air tickets at www.EaseMyTrip.com.
The customer must use Promo Code EASE5000 while booking to avail this offer.
The offer can't be combined with any other discounts/offers/deals.
This offer is valid on minimum transaction of Rs.5000
In case of misuse and exploitation of this offer by the customers, EaseMyTrip can cancel the booking or deny the offer.
The offer is only restricted for the general customers of EaseMyTrip, travel professionals/agents can't avail this offer.
EaseMyTrip reserves the right to amend/modify/withdraw the offer any time without any prior notice.
In addition, terms & condition of www.EaseMyTrip.com also apply.
If case of any dispute, it will be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts in New Delhi.
Offer Validity Till 31stAugust 2017
